start.text: My hull is vented and my crew are suited.
All systems are green! $shipName ready for combat!

start_boss.text: Was this in a course I missed?

retreat.text: Training says now's the time to regroup!
Every battle we escape is another one we fight!

engaged.text: Remember! Kinetics for the barriers, HE for the armoring!
This is a good standoff distance.

need_help.text: Calling for help! I'm being overwhelmed!
This is too much- We need help!

pursuing.text: Now's the time to break lines!
Keep the pressure up! That's how we win!

running.text: Don't feel bad $commanderFirstName, there'll be another.

hull_90.text: Don't panic, we haven't lost control yet!
Glad we vented the atmosphere! We just took a hull hit!

hull_50.text: I'm n-not shaking- W-we can win this.
My damage control board is all yellow!
Prepare the auxilary bridge. $officerName won't lose command.

hull_30.text: It's too much! It's all too much!

overload.text: Make sure there's no conduit ruptures! Get our shields back on!
What's the procedure for this?- Reset the reactor?

death.text: Move! Move! Move! Get to the lifeboats!

victory.text: I love it when a plan goes well.

victory_boss.text: They'll *have* to teach a class about this!
